ingredients: 2 cooked, boneless chicken breast halves, diced
instructions: Heat the sesame oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Stir in the garlic and salt.
Cook and stir 1 minute, then stir in the pine nuts, and cook until golden, about 5 minutes.
Add the diced chicken breast, and cook a few minutes to reheat.
Stir in the peanut butter, soy sauce, and jalapeno pepper until the peanut butter has melted.
Pour in the water, and bring to a simmer.
Cook and stir until the sauce has thickened, about 5 minutes more.
title: Peanut Butter Sauce Chicken
steps: Heat the sesame oil in a skillet over medium heat. Stir in the garlic and salt. Cook and stir 1 minute, then stir in the pine nuts, and cook until golden, about 5 minutes. Add the diced chicken breast, and cook a few minutes to reheat. Stir in the peanut butter, soy sauce, and jalapeno pepper until the peanut butter has melted. Pour in the water, and bring to a simmer. Cook and stir until the sauce has thickened, about 5 minutes more.
